title: Cannot install py-entrypoints on an airgapped system
body:
I'm working with the following setup: I have a frontend, which has access to the general internet but I'm trying to build on an airgapped cluster which has only access to a local file system.

In order to install stuff on the cluster, I'm doing a
```
spack fetch -dependencies py-entrypoints
```
to put the sources on the local file system and the doing (essentially a slurm ```srun```)
```
cluster spack install -v py-entrypoints
```
the latter fails with a failed fetch of ```configparser@3.5```

Introducing 
```
depends_on('py-configparser@3.5:', when='^python@2.7', type=('build', 'run'))
```
for ```py-entrypoints``` leads to
